property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: A base for other temporary directories.

property.name: fs.default.name
property.description: The name of the default file system. A URI whosescheme and authority determine the FileSystem implementation. Theuri's scheme determines the config property (fs.SCHEME.impl) namingthe FileSystem implementation class. The uri's authority is used todetermine the host, port, etc. for a filesystem.
